# RUN: llvm-mc --disassemble %s -triple powerpc64-unknown-unknown -mcpu=pwr7 | FileCheck %s

# CHECK: lvebx 2, 3, 4

# CHECK: lvehx 2, 3, 4                   
0x7c 0x43 0x20 0x4e
